HomeModule.Description: With this free application, you can learn English words more easily than before. After registration, you can create any words you like and practice them in four different ways.
HomeModule.Modes: You can learn in four different modes.
HomeModule.FlashcardMode: In flashcard mode, you can memorize words with cards and check them after flipping.
HomeModule.TypingMode: You can type in the words in typing mode.
HomeModule.SelectionMode: In selection mode, you can choose from a set quantity of words.
HomeModule.ListeningMode: You need to write down the spoken word during listening comprehension.
HomeModule.Voice: You can select the voice type that suits you.
HomeModule.Chart: You can see your progress on a chart.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
